name: Planet Invaders (Miraj123)
description:
Planet Invaders
Note: Enter full screen to see everything correctly.
I made this game in a couple of days.
In this game, you are a massive boulder trying to protect the earth from alien invaders but you can't kill or destroy the invaders you can only knock them back.
Attributions:
All the sfx and music are from the unity asset store and opengameart.com.
The space background is from https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/realistic-galaxy-background_14960493.htm#que...
